snippet: In a journal of profiles, the Yale AIDS Memorial Project honors students, teachers and staff members who died of complications of AIDS.
abstract: Yale AIDS Memorial Project honors students, teachers and staff members who have died of AIDS-related complications; founder Christopher Glazek launched the project after realizing that nearly an entire generation of Yale alumni had succumbed to the disease.
lead_paragraph: In a journal of profiles, the Yale AIDS Memorial Project honors students, teachers and staff members who died of complications of AIDS.

headline.seo: Yale Memorial Project Commemorates Those Lost to AIDS
headline.main: A Project by Yale Alumni Profiles Lives Lost to AIDS
headline.print_headline: A Project by Yale Alumni Profiles Lives Lost to AIDS
